thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com | 2 of 447
thread.title: MMS

author: MMS
title: MMS
text: To be fair, I understand that there was a system problem the day I was there that turned what should have been a two hour process into a four hour process. In any case, my salesperson Aarik was straightforward, honest and very easy to deal with. The situation that brought me to drive time was not one I was pleased about, but he made the experience as painless as possible. I think that they do exactly as advertised, and it is fairly simple.
